__New brand partners & ongoing promotions__

Did you know that you can get your Valorant points (among many others, of course) and get rewarded and invested at the same time? Now you do! Welcoming our new brand partners on Raiz Rewards, __Razer Gold & SEAGM!__

Shop online with our brand partners via Raiz Rewards and earn a percentage of your purchase invested back into your Raiz account. \*

Just click the “__Shop Online Here__” button via Raiz Rewards to be on your way to get the cash reward.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

### __New Brands__

__Razer Gold  
__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/RAZER-GOLD.png)

__(+ 1.4% invested)__

__Razer Gold__ is the leading virtual credit for gamers worldwide, with over 28 million registered users. With a network of close to 6 million channel touchpoints, users can easily buy and use __Razer Gold__ in over 42,000 games and entertainment titles.

Shop online now with __Razer Gold__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __1.4%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__SEAGM__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/SEAGM.png)

__(+0.49% invested)__

__SEAGM__ is a global digital goods platform that provides mobile games top-up, digital prepaid code for games, gift cards, and more.

Shop online now with __SEAGM__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __0.49%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.
